titles.title: American Housing and Economic Mobility Act of 2025
American Housing and Economic Mobility Act of 2025
Community Reinvestment Reform Act of 2025
To make housing more affordable, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committees on the Judiciary, Veterans' Affairs, and Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
